name: FeeFighters
description: FeeFighters makes the process of choosing a merchant account provider as easy as shopping for a plane ticket online. In minutes, business owners can choose the best deal on credit card processing with a reverse auction marketplace that saves the average business owner 40 percent on credit card processing. FeeFighters also provides free tools, such as the credit card processing calculator, that help businesses make better decisions about their financial services.
